test_cases.question: That makes sense. Now can you tell me more about the different types of mental modifications mentioned in later sutras?

conversation_context.content: What is yoga according to Patanjali?
Yoga is citta-vritti-nirodhaḥ - the stilling of the modifications of the mind.
What are some examples of these modifications?
The sutras mention various types of vrittis including pramana (right knowledge), viparyaya (misconception), vikalpa (imagination), nidra (sleep), and smriti (memory).
